parameters.name: datasetId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for a Dataset.

nested_items.name: datasetId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for a Dataset.

nested_items.name: datasetArn
nested_items.description: The ARN identifier of the Dataset.

nested_items.name: datasetTitle
nested_items.description: Display title for a Dataset.

nested_items.name: kind
nested_items.description: The format in which Dataset data is structured.
TABULAR --- Data is structured in a tabular format.
NON_TABULAR --- Data is structured in a non-tabular format.

nested_items.name: datasetDescription
nested_items.description: A description of the Dataset.

nested_items.name: createTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp at which the Dataset was created in FinSpace. The value is determined as epoch time in milliseconds. For example, the value for Monday, November 1, 2021 12:00:00 PM UTC is specified as 1635768000000.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The last time that the Dataset was modified. The value is determined as epoch time in milliseconds. For example, the value for Monday, November 1, 2021 12:00:00 PM UTC is specified as 1635768000000.

nested_items.name: schemaDefinition
nested_items.description: Definition for a schema on a tabular Dataset.

nested_items.name: tabularSchemaConfig
nested_items.description: The configuration for a schema on a tabular Dataset.

nested_items.name: columns
nested_items.description: List of column definitions.

nested_items.name: dataType
nested_items.description: Data type of a column.

STRING --- A String data type. CHAR --- A char data type. INTEGER --- An integer data type. TINYINT --- A tinyint data type. SMALLINT --- A smallint data type. BIGINT --- A bigint data type. FLOAT --- A float data type. DOUBLE --- A double data type. DATE --- A date data type. DATETIME --- A datetime data type. BOOLEAN --- A boolean data type. BINARY --- A binary data type.

nested_items.name: columnName
nested_items.description: The name of a column.

nested_items.name: columnDescription
nested_items.description: Description for a column.

nested_items.name: primaryKeyColumns
nested_items.description: List of column names used for primary key.
(string) --- Column Name.

nested_items.name: alias
nested_items.description: The unique resource identifier for a Dataset.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: Status of the Dataset creation.
PENDING --- Dataset is pending creation.
FAILED --- Dataset creation has failed.
SUCCESS --- Dataset creation has succeeded.
RUNNING --- Dataset creation is running.
